title: Fiji's Best Five-Star All-Inclusive Island Resort
description: Experience an all-inclusive, adults-only escape at Namale Resort & Spa, Fiji's number-one all-inclusive resort, owned by celebrity motivational speaker Tony Robbins. Enjoy six nights in a luxurious Garden Tropical Bure with all daily meals (breakfasts, three-course lunches and five-course dinners PLUS snacks), a private outdoor dining experience, unlimited alcohol and soft drinks, a spa treatment each, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, return airport transfers and more for only $5,999 for two adults, valued up to $10,364. Watch the resort video below.

title: Fiji All-Inclusive Eco-Luxury with World-Class Dive Centre, FJ$500 Spa Credit & Two Kids Play & Eat Free + Stay Six & Pay Four
description:
Indulge in the ultimate island escape with this limited time offer for a luxurious stay at the five-star Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort Fiji - a secluded tropical hideaway where the rainforest meets the reef. This boutique eco-resort, framed by lush palm groves and home to just 25 thatched bures, is one of the most opulent island destinations in the South Pacific. It's also the gateway to one of the most spectacular dive sites in the world, whose cerulean waters are rich with marine life and colourful coral. Widely regarded as the pinnacle five-star resort in Fiji, this gem in the ocean promises rejuvenation, authentic cuisine and culture.

Immerse yourself in island bliss by dining alfresco on Fijian and South Pacific fare, clink your glasses at two magnificent bars, laze beside the sunkissed pools, indulge in a revitalising spa treatment or head to the world-class PADI dive centre. The resort's shining jewel is the complimentary nanny service which comes as standard during the day, and little ones are guaranteed to adore the program's fun-filled program, boasting snorkelling, rainforest walks, ziplining, cooking classes and more. Rejoin as a family to watch the glowing sunset and savour memories to last a lifetime.
